events.message: I ordered a smartphone last week, but I want to request a refund because the product did not meet my expectations and arrived with some issues.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting money back and dissatisfaction with the product.
Assigning support agent Emma Johnson to handle this refund request for the order placed by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m Emma, and I’ll assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, we need the order number and a brief description of the issues you encountered with the product.
My order number is 123456789. The phone screen has scratches and the battery drains very fast, so I don’t want to keep it.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund and arrange a prepaid return label for you. Would you like us to proceed with this?
Yes, please proceed with the refund and send me the return label. I appreciate your quick response.
We have processed your refund and emailed the return shipping label. Please drop off the package at your earliest convenience.
We wanted to check in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case now.
